objects

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a reservation of one or more tickets. The customer is identified with his forwarding address.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reservation(int code, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String number, java.lang.String codeFlight)
      Constructs a reservation without any ticket.
      Reservation(java.lang.String codeFlight, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String number)
      Constructs an empty reservation (no tickets).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(java.lang.String codeFlight,
                   java.lang.String email,
                   java.lang.String number)
        Constructs an empty reservation (no tickets).
        Parameters:
        codeFlight - Code of the flight of which the customer wants a reservation.
        email - Email of the customer.
        number - Phone address of the customer.

      • Reservation

                   java.lang.String email,
                   java.lang.String number,
                   java.lang.String codeFlight)
        Constructs a reservation without any ticket.
        Parameters:
        code - Code of the reservation.
        email - Email of the customer.
        number - Phone address of the customer.
        codeFlight - Code of the flight of which the customer wants a reservation.
